statements: DELETE FROM identification WHERE person_id = 100 AND scan_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND iris_scan_id IN (SELECT id FROM iris_scans WHERE image_data IS NOT NULL);
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3 AND user_id = 7;
DELETE FROM iris_scans WHERE user_id = 1 AND scan_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = (SELECT role_id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin') AND user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin');
